story.kicker_image_caption: Nivin Pauly and Atlee join hands for a film?
story.storykicker: The yet-untitled film is till in the nascent stage and the makers are yet to let out an official announcement.
story.storybody:
Atlee is still basking in the success of Vijay's Theri, which turned out to be a blockbuster of 2016. The young director might next team up with Nivin Pauly for a yet-untitled Tamil film, according to Only Kollywood.

ALSO READ: Vijay 60 - Ilayathalapathy will talk in Nellai slang in his next film with Bharathan

The film is till in the nascent stage and the makers are yet to make an official announcement about the film.

Meanwhile, Nivin Pauly will start the shooting of the Tamil remake of Kannada film Ulidavaru Kandante. The film will be helmed by Gautham Ramachandran, who is making his directorial debut .

Nivin has also turned producer for another Malayalam project. Directed by Althaf of Premam fame, the film will be a light-hearted romantic drama. Nivin is playing the lead role in the film, which also has many Premam actors in pivotal roles. The film will go on floors once Nivin completes the shooting of his ongoing project

Atlee, on the other hand, is making his debut as a producer in Sangili Bungili Kathava Thorae, which has Jiiva, Sri Divya in lead roles. This film is co-produced by Fox Star Studios.
story.magazinekicker: The yet-untitled film is till in the nascent stage and the makers are yet to let out an official announcement.
